modName: Hero of the Legion - A Unique Armor for Imperial Players
summary:
Awarded to Legionaries who have acted with great courage and valor on the field of battle while in service to the Emperor.

This mod adds a replacer for the General\'s armor as well as a new unique and creatable bronze armor.
descriptionHtml:
This mod replaces the textures for General Tullius\' armor and also adds a new gilded bronze imperial armor to the game. The new armor is unique, creatable and can be found under the Imperial category at the forge. The bronze armor has an armor rating comparable to steel plate armor.



If you like this, checkout my other mods:

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/24593]\"Ancestral Helms\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32070]\"Blued Steel Plate Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32072]\"Gilded Steel Plate Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31796]\"Steel Armor Tweaks\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/31803]\"Nordic Carved Armor Tweaks\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32516]\"Gilded Nordic Carved Armor\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/32715]\"Stalhrim with Scalemail\"[/url]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/33772]\"Imperial Legion Reborn\"[/url]
author: ViperMkII
